textBeforeTable: 2015 - 612 pitches === As noted by Steve N, Rhee's Baseball Data pitch breakdown page is here. Dae-Eun Rhee's pitch breakdown for 2015, as requested by anon. by Gen on May.12, 2015 @ 1:17 pm, under NPB Tags: Chiba Lotte Marines, Dae-Eun Rhee, Stats [5/12/2015] Chiba Lotte Marines: Dae-Eun Rhee pitch breakdown Leave a Comment (continue reading...) Thirteen multi-hit games (two or more hits). Six modashos (three or more hits), including two four-hit games. 44-for-95, 20 R, 11 2B, 5 HR, 19 RBI, 16 BB, 13 SO. Ikuhiro Kiyota's (Lotte) hitting streak ended at twenty-three games on June 10. Here's a little more about the hitting streak: by Gen on Jun.11, 2015 @ 11:34 am, under NPB Tags: Chiba Lotte Marines, Ikuhiro Kiyota, Stats [6/11/2015] Chiba Lotte Marines: Ikuhiro Kiyota’s hitting streak ends at twenty-three games Tag: Stats Site Updates 高校・大学・社会人 プロ その他 Scrapbook Women's Baseball Video Games MLB Baseball Cards Anime Other Spring Camp Roster Updates Postseason Game Summaries
textAfterTable: [5/11/2015] Hanshin Tigers: Randy Messenger taken off active roster by Gen on May.11, 2015 @ 9:12 pm, under NPB Tags: Hanshin Tigers, Randy Messenger, Stats Randy Messenger was taken off the active roster today for an overhaul. He could return to the active roster in the minimum ten days for a start against Yomiuri on May 21 at Koshien. For those interested, a breakdown of his pitches over the last three seasons, including min/max velocities and strike percentages for each pitch type. Data was taken from Yahoo over the years and may not be 100 percent accurate. If you would like to see more information like this for other pitchers, please feel free to leave a comment below and I will be more than happy to comply. === 2015 - 862 pitches Pitch NP % Min Vel Max Vel Strikes(Balls) Strike % Curve 112 13.0% 108km/h 122km/h 52(60) 46.4% Fastball 459 53.2% 134km/h 152km/h 260(199) 56.6% Slider 149 17.3% 121km/h 142km/h 82(67) 55.0% Fork 142 16.5% 128km/h 140km/h 38(104) 26.8% * 23 were 150km/h or higher (5.0%) 2014 - 3533 pitches Pitch NP % Min Vel Max Vel Strikes(Balls) Strike %
